channel.title: Gaming Headphones/Headset
channel.description:
I am going to buy some headphones or a headset and I would like to know which to buy. My max price is around 70, $75 would be fine.
If you have a recomendation please tell me where i can get it and why you think its good.

item.title: Gaming Headphones/Headset
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Oh man you are only like … about four to five months too late. They had astro a40’s on sale for like $50 at the microsoft stores. Companies that have price matches with Microsoft was like " don’t do this don’t do this! "

Sadly though normally the a50’s cost you about $300 ( which I have, and are amazing to say the least )

I think the krakens are probably your best bet if you can find a pair in your price range. There are also some that have the skulls on the site that are white? You seem them in a lot of gaming youtube videos but I can’t remember the name of them at the moment I vaguely recall somebody telling me they are normally around $85.

Read full topic

item.title: Gaming Headphones/Headset
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I personally use Razer Krakens. The pair I got have a mic in it. There’s a cheaper pair that doesn’t have them, but it’s like a $20 difference.
They have 5.1 surround sound in them.
http://www.razerzone.com/store/razer-kraken <Regular ones (no mic)
http://www.razerzone.com/store/razer-kraken-pro I have these but green. They were $99 when I bought them like a year or so ago.
http://www.razerzone.com/store/razer-kraken-71 <Here are their newest versions of mine. They have 7.1 instead of 5.1 (I’m jealous).

Read full topic
